1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta12: Updated Portal Saved Data; moved jona's things in external mod; updated Banana; removed nut_bush_block; added Nut"Tree/Bush" with Leaves, Nuts, Log and a Sapling; Squirrels are now bred with nuts; the rainbow axe has now a texture
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta13: Fixed Crashing Bug, Changed NutBush Generation
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta14: Changed NutBush Generation; Added CircleFoliagePlacer and used it in NutBush
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta15: The Chance of NutBushLeaves to grow is now much lower than before(now 2%, before 20%); Squirrels are now smaller, when they're childs; Nutbushs are now generated in Forests and the Silver Tale; Small Nut Bushs exists now; Squirrels are now searching for Tree and move to them; The Rainbow Pickaxe now has a texture
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta16: Changed from DeferredWorkQueue to ParallelDispatchEvent; NutBushLeaves have only every 50 ticks a chance to grow; NutBushPlantation and SmallNutBushPlantation are now generated in every Biome
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.1.0-Beta17: Changed Itemsgroup of the Spawneggs to Biologic; Changed Eat Nuts Goal of Squirrel; Added PlaceNutGoal; Acitivated ClimbOnTreeGoal; Changed Silver Block texture; Changed Silver Ingot texture

1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta19: Changed Silver Leaves texture; Changed Silver Log (also stripped) texture; Changed Silver Sapling texture; Removed Glowing Stone; tlp Command is now working; Rubin and rainbow ore are now genearted in every biome; Moved Features from JSON to Hardcode; The Rainbow Hoe now has an texture; The Rainbow Armor and Shovel now have textures; Fixed bugs in World gen; Added Foliage Placer Type; Updated to Minecraft 1.16.4
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta20: Changed Silver Planks texture; In Silvertales are now Gold Trees instead of NutBush generated; Changed Emerald Armor items texture; Changd Silver Trapdoor texture; Changed Squirrel Model and Texture; Overworked Parallel Dispatching; Overworked NutBush generation; Held Items of Squirrels are now shown; Updated Position finding of Silver Portal; Updated PlaceNutsGoal and EatNutsGoal of Squirrels
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta21: Changed Squirrel texture; Updated Position finding of Silver Portal; Squirrel Spawns now in forests and Silvertales; Hold Items of Squirrels are now rendered
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta22: Updated Squirrel Goals; Changed Names of Spawn Eggs; Fixed Bug in Held Item rendering of Squirrel; Added Squirrel to Language Packs; Updated Squirrel Rendering; Squirrels now are sitting down while they eat a nut; ClimbOnTreeGoal is removed for a moment(It will came back fixed in next release)
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta23: Improved Squirrel Data Storage; Added ClimbOnTreeGoal again; Squirrel climbs now on trees; It is now more likely that the squirrel will eat a nut when it is warmer; Overworked Squirrel Goals; Added Animations of Climbing on Trees for Squirrels; Changed Name of silver_logs from Silver Tree to Silver Log
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta24: Fixed and Improved Tlp Command; Improved SilverPortal; Removed Emerald Shard; Changed Armor Material Config; Changed Tool Config of Emerald, Rubin, Saphir and Rainbow; Improved Teleporting between Dimensions; Improved Teleporting of Get-Home Enchantment and FuelItem; Changed Name from Leggins to Leggings; The actuall destination Dimension can be read by clicking on the PortalBlock
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta25: The Silver Portal Destination Dimension now can't be set to 'the_end'; Improved Spawn Position finding of Silver Portal; Changed Nut Bush Log texture; Changed Saphir textures; Updated Language packs
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0-Beta26: Changed Blue Glow Block texture; Changed Rubin texture; Changed Name of glow_blue_block from Blue Glowing Block to Blue Glow Block; Changed Rubin and Saphir Ore texture; Changed Armor Model texture; Changed Silver Door Texture
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.0: Changed Accesstransformer; Changed Alexandrit Ore texture; Fixed Bug Rubin Hoe looks like Emerald Hoe, Fixed Banana generation; Vines generate at Mega Silver Trees; Changed SpawnPosition Finder of Silver Portals; Added Silver Button loot table; Changed Silver Ore Texture; Fixed Bug in Banana Tree Decorator
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.1.1: Changed Name of rubin to Ruby; Changed Settings of Desert Tempel Structure
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.2.0-Beta1: Added Runetable Block, Screen and Container; Added new Recipe Type 'runes'; Added Rune Base; Added Green Rune and Green Rune Shard; Added PacketHandler; Added Rune Inventory; Added Rune Base Block; Added Giant Zombie King to expand Rune Inventory; Changed Rainbow crafing recipe; Changed Name of 'rainbow' to 'rainbow rune shard'; Changed ItemGroup of Rainbow to Runes; Giant Zombie King spawns more Zombies if more players are in the world; The Giant Zombie King spawns now also in Days Zombies and may also Skeletons; It may wears a diamond sword; Giant Zombie Kings doen't attack zombies and skeletons anymore; The Runes are max-useable 100 times; Intruced Runetype; Runes are now damageable; Changed maxDamage of Tools
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.2.0-Beta2: Added orange, blue, red, yellow, gray, brown and purple rune; Runes are now repairable in the Runetable; Gray Runes and Rainbow shards can repair every Rune; Yellow Rune makes Blocks breaking faster; Added effects to red and blue rune; Fixed Bug in RuneInventoryRegistry; Added Brown Rune Effect; Gray Runes nolonger can be repaired with Gray Runes; Added effects to Green and Purple Rune; added Orange Rune Effekt; Added Tooltips to Runes; Fixed Bug Tools and Sword are rendered like items

1.16.5.1.16.5-1.1.2: Fixed bug on accessing the silver portal
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.0-Beta3: Added Structure Configuration system; Improved Structure Gen; Added Tempel Loot table; Added Green Dungeon where green Rune Shards can be found; Modded Ores are now more rare; Added OrangeShrine where orange rune shard can be found; In Desert Tempels now Yellow runes can be found; Added Landingstages in Swamps where bvrown rune shard can be found; Added Purplehouse in Birch forests where purple rune shards can be found
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.1.3: Improved Silver Portal System and fixed one issue in it
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.0-Beta4: Improved Silver Portal System and fixed one issue in it
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.0-Beta5: Fixed Game crashed when trying to join unloaded dimension, made it more easy to register silver dimension (on client): You only need to enable this in config; Added Giant where Gray Rune Shards can be found; Added Blue Rune Structure, here can the blue rune shard be found. Default is viking ship, but in config you can set to house; Added Blacksmith where red rune shards can be found
